meanings.definition: One that dates or establishes dates.
meanings.sent1: The dater wrote down the important dates in the calendar.
meanings.sent2: My friend is a dater and always knows when events are happening.
meanings.sent3: The dater made sure not to forget their anniversary date.
meanings.sent4: The dater's pen marked the date on the paper like a tiny time traveler.
meanings.sent5: The dater's job is to keep track of all the dates and times.

meanings.definition: A person who goes on dates.
meanings.sent1: The dater enjoyed their dinner date last night.
meanings.sent2: She is a dater who loves meeting new people.
meanings.sent3: The dater was nervous but excited for their blind date.
meanings.sent4: Being a dater means trying new restaurants and activities.
meanings.sent5: The dater's friends always ask for dating advice.

meanings.definition: A device used to mark the time or date.
meanings.sent1: The dater on my wristwatch helps me stay punctual.
meanings.sent2: I set the dater on my phone to remind me of important meetings.
meanings.sent3: The dater on the clock beeped to signal midnight.
meanings.sent4: The dater on the digital screen glowed in the dark room.
meanings.sent5: The dater on the calendar flips to a new day every night.
